purchasing_trend_suggestions: Increase consumption of nutrient-dense foods like eggs, toor dal, and vegetables (e.g., cucumber, coccinia, lady's finger) to improve overall nutrient intake.
Replace high-glycemic snacks with healthier alternatives like soya chunks or whole wheat products to better manage blood sugar levels.
Incorporate more fiber-rich foods such as lentils and vegetables to support digestive health and satiety.
Choose low-sodium options when available to reduce overall sodium intake.
Opt for products with higher nutrient density scores and better cost-nutrient ratios to maximize nutritional value per rupee spent.
